channel.description: Recent content in question mark on Mark Gingrass Blog

item.title: R Lowercase Function in Corpus Error Solved
item.description: In my last video tutorial, I demonstrated the steps to tap into the power of the Twitter API to download Tweets based on search terms and import them into R. My plan was to make a follow up video showing how to clean the twitter data and run a Word Cloud on common terms. However, I ran into a slight snag early on. The code was supposed to be simple and quick.

item.title: R Lowercase Function in Corpus Error Solved
